attributes.action: To link the pay rise for the public sector with the Consumer Price Index (CPI)
attributes.additional_details:
Fair Compensation: ensures that salaries are inline with cost of living, and fair attracting workfare and appreciating services provided.

Political Neutrality: public sector employees are not used as political pawns / campaign issues, and receive fair and consistent treatment regardless of the party in power.

Fiscal discipline -  future governments are compelled to consider the economic reality of inflation when planning, preventing public service pay being side-lined or neglected
attributes.background:
Link Pay rise with CPI where lower bandings / Grades get CPI + 2 %

and higher bands get CPI + 0.5 % and 

VSM gets CPI% pay rise

in the event of negative CPI, pay remains same
